staff.name: John Doe
staff.description: John has been serving for 12 years as the lead pastor and main preacher.  He has a wife and 3 children.

staff.name: Josh Smith
staff.description: Josh has been serving as a part-time elder since 2012.  He 2 children and has been married to his wife for 8 years.

notifications.description: There will be no services this week (the 12th) due to the snow storm.  Please tune into our live stream.
Due to Covid-19, sunday school has been canceled.  Please wear a mask if you are able.

ministries.name: Jail
ministries.description: Every other Saturday, we bring the word to the local jail. If you would like morei information, please talk to one of the deacons.

ministries.name: Pro-life Ministry
ministries.description: The church as a whole is very involved with the womans shelter downtown.  We are involved in various aspects. If you would like more information, please talk to one of the deacons.
